name: 古诗消消大师-Chinese Ancient Poetry Matching Game
name_original: 古诗消消大师-Chinese Ancient Poetry Matching Game
description:
This game is a classic tile-matching game. Players can match tiles by clicking on the corresponding tiles in the order of Chinese ancient poetry, lyrics, and prose to pass levels. Through this game, players can experience the charm of traditional Chinese culture.

During China's long history, countless outstanding literary works have been created. Among them, Tang poetry, Song lyrics, and parallel prose are particularly representative. This game selects a portion of these works and uses the elimination game format to guide players in understanding and recalling classical Chinese culture.
